ModelCompound Class Reference

This class manages the ModelCompounds and instances, a modelcompound uses the visual compound combined with LOD values loaded from a model file to render simple models more efficiently. More...

#include <model_compound.hpp>

Detailed Description

This class manages the ModelCompounds and instances, a modelcompound uses the visual compound combined with LOD values loaded from a model file to render simple models more efficiently.
